item.description: Join us in a gathering to celebrate and enjoy FOOD in Spanish! If you are so inspired, pick a recipe in Spanish, such as on http://www.univision.... . This is Univision's list of recipes from many Latin American countries. Print out the recipe with copies to pass out, and share the dish. If you are not so inspired, just bring a bit of food to share and join us while we talk food and recipes in Spanish.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Tertulia: Recetas para Probar y Compartir/Recipes to Taste and Share
